thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: Naomi was very friendly, knowledgeable, and enthusiastic about her home town. We all enjoyed here tour of old San Juan and were provided a lot of information about the city history, modern politics, as well as descriptions of many of the buildings in Old Town. She also recommended good places to shop and eat. The only disappointment was that we would love to have spent several more hours with our wonderful guide.
